General.Name: Xos Inc
General.Description: Xos, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells battery-electric commercial vehicles. It also offers a range of services to facilitate the transition of fleets to electric vehicles, including charging infrastructure, vehicle maintenance, financing, and service. The company was founded in 2020 and is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 3550 Tyburn Street, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90065
